Bulletprooflist

With Bulletprooflist you can easily generate the bulletrproof email version of an HTML list.

Fork me on Github

Generate bulletproof lists for email from regular lists

You can use it for email template development. The code will support most of the email clients with the well-supported HTML and CSS properties it uses.

Paste your email HTML here
